title: That’s a Drag!
description: A show canceled too soon about a family who doesn’t adhere to the gender norms of fashion.
quote: Hey mom, does this skirt make my butt look big?
altHero: mom in a suit talkng to dad and teenage son who are both in dresses
alt1: young son is surprised, both he and his grandfather in the background are in dresses
alt2: mom in a purple dress shirt and tie
alt3: young son holding up a pair of dentures
alt4: dad and teenage son, both in dresses
